verses.verse: O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, how long shall I <S%H7768>cry<s%>, and thou wilt not <S%H8085>hear<s%>? I cry <S%H2199>out<s%> unto thee of <S%H2555>violence<s%>, and thou wilt not <S%H3467>save<s%>.

Why dost thou <S%H7200>show<s%> me <S%H205>iniquity<s%>, and <S%H5027>look<s%> upon <S%H5999>perverseness<s%>? for <S%H7701>destruction<s%> and <S%H2555>violence<s%> are before <S%H7379>me<s%>; and there is strife, and <S%H4066>contention<s%> riseth <S%H5375>up<s%>.

Therefore the <S%H8451>law<s%> is <S%H6313>slacked<s%>, and <S%H4941>justice<s%> doth <S%H5331>never<s%> go <S%H3318>forth<s%>; for the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> doth <S%H3803>compass<s%> about the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>; therefore <S%H4941>justice<s%> goeth <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H6127>perverted<s%>.

Behold <S%H7200><s%> ye among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and <S%H5027>look<s%>, and <S%H8539>wonder<s%> <S%H8539>marvellously<s%>; for I am <S%H6466>working<s%> a <S%H6467>work<s%> in your <S%H3117>days<s%>, which ye will not <S%H539>believe<s%> though it be told <S%H5608>you<s%>.

For <S%H6965><s%>, lo, I raise up the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>, that <S%H4751>bitter<s%> and <S%H4116>hasty<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%>, that <S%H1980>march<s%> through the <S%H4800>breadth<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, to <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H4908>dwelling-places<s%> that are not theirs.
They are <S%H366>terrible<s%> and <S%H3372>dreadful<s%>; their <S%H4941>judgment<s%> and their <S%H7613>dignity<s%> proceed from <S%H3318>themselves<s%>.

Their <S%H5483>horses<s%> also are <S%H7043>swifter<s%> than <S%H5246>leopards<s%>, and are more <S%H2300>fierce<s%> than the <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H2061>wolves<s%>; and their <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> press <S%H6335>proudly<s%> <S%H6571>on<s%>: yea, their horsemen <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H7350>far<s%>; they <S%H5774>fly<s%> as an <S%H5404>eagle<s%> that <S%H2363>hasteth<s%> to <S%H398>devour<s%>.

They <S%H935>come<s%> all of them for <S%H2555>violence<s%>; the <S%H4041>set<s%> of their <S%H6440>faces<s%> is <S%H6921>forwards<s%>; and they <S%H622>gather<s%> <S%H7628>captives<s%> as the <S%H2344>sand<s%>.

Yea <S%H7046><s%>, he scoffeth at <S%H4428>kings<s%>, and <S%H7336>princes<s%> are a <S%H4890>derision<s%> unto <S%H7832>him<s%>; he derideth every <S%H4013>stronghold<s%>; for he <S%H6651>heapeth<s%> up <S%H6083>dust<s%>, and taketh <S%H3920>it<s%>.
Then shall he <S%H2498>sweep<s%> by as a <S%H7307>wind<s%>, and shall pass <S%H5674>over<s%>, and be <S%H816>guilty<s%>, even he <S%H2098>whose<s%> <S%H3581>might<s%> is his <S%H433>god<s%>.

Art not thou from <S%H6924>everlasting<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>, my Holy <S%H6918>One<s%>? we shall not <S%H4191>die<s%>. O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, thou hast <S%H7760>ordained<s%> him for <S%H4941>judgment<s%>; and <S%H6697>thou<s%>, O Rock, hast <S%H3245>established<s%> him for <S%H3198>correction<s%>.

Thou that art of <S%H2889>purer<s%> <S%H5869>eyes<s%> than to <S%H7200>behold<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>, and that <S%H3201>canst<s%> not <S%H5027>look<s%> on <S%H5999>perverseness<s%>, wherefore <S%H5027>lookest<s%> thou upon them that deal <S%H898>treacherously<s%>, and holdest thy <S%H2790>peace<s%> when the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1104>swalloweth<s%> up the man that is more righteous than <S%H6662>he<s%>;
and <S%H6213>makest<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> as the <S%H1709>fishes<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, as the creeping <S%H7431>things<s%>, that have no ruler over <S%H4910>them<s%>?

He taketh <S%H5927>up<s%> all of them with the <S%H2443>angle<s%>, he <S%H1641>catcheth<s%> them in his <S%H2764>net<s%>, and <S%H622>gathereth<s%> them in his <S%H4365>drag<s%>: therefore he <S%H8055>rejoiceth<s%> and is <S%H1523>glad<s%>.

Therefore he <S%H2076>sacrificeth<s%> unto his <S%H2764>net<s%>, and burneth <S%H6999>incense<s%> unto his <S%H4365>drag<s%>; because by <S%H1992>them<s%> his <S%H2506>portion<s%> is <S%H8082>fat<s%>, and his <S%H3978>food<s%> <S%H1277>plenteous<s%>.
Shall he therefore <S%H7324>empty<s%> his <S%H2764>net<s%>, and <S%H2550>spare<s%> not to <S%H2026>slay<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>?
